**Welcome to the ENVX1002 handbook.** This handbook is designed to be an *optional* companion to the lectures, labs and assessments for the course.


## How to use this handbook

Read this handbook before, or *after* each lecture to better understand certain concepts. You can also use this book as a reference when working on lab exercises and assessments.

You may download a PDF copy of this handbook on the sidebar of the HTML version of this book. You may also download the source code for this book from the [GitHub repository][handbook].
